text: John Barry Stewart (born 28 March 1937) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Whitby Town, and was on the books of Darlington without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Middlesbrough Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Whitby Town F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Stewart (footballer, born 1937)
